ENGLISH: Like the Pharaohs of ancient times, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetPossPronoun] [GetFromNewRelation] [New.GetTitledFirstName] have gotten married under the blessed auspices of the gods, ensuring fullness and Order. We can collect a Royal Aid Duty to pay for the ceremonies.
GERMAN: Wie die Pharaonen des Altertums haben [From.GetTitledFirstName] und [From.GetPossPronoun] [GetFromNewRelation] [New.GetTitledFirstName] unter der gesegneten Schirmherrschaft der Götter geheiratet und so für Fülle und Ordnung gesorgt. Wir können eine königliche Hilfsabgabe erheben, um für die Zeremonien zu bezahlen.

ENGLISH: In [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] has formed a new society of warriors called The Champions of the Sun. A fellowship of warriors dedicated to the improving themselves through martial training and athletics. This [From.GetFirstName] has put out the call for those of like mind to join this warrior lodge, even those who don't worship the gods of Egypt.
